name: SFUniversalLink
desc: An object that provides browsers with the ability to discover associations between an app and a website.

items.name: init?(webpageURL: URL)
items.desc: Creates a universal link object with the URL.

items.name: var applicationURL: URL
items.desc: The URL to the app that can open this universal link.

items.name: var isEnabled: Bool
items.desc: A flag that indicates whether the universal link is enabled.

items.name: var webpageURL: URL
items.desc: The URL specified when initializing the receiver.
